body.name: COOFANDY Mens Casual Button Down Shirts Wrinkle Free Long Sleeve Untucked Dress Shirt
features: 【Textured Wrinkle Free Shirts】Mens long sleeve button down shirt is made of high quality cotton and mixed materials,ensuring breathability, softness, and lightweight feel.Providing you a comfortable wearing experience,keeping you cool and relaxed all day.

【Classic Button Down Shirts】This mens casual button down shirts comes with classic shirt collar, long sleeves, chest pocket, adjustable cuffs and solid color.You're sure to find the perfect fit for your personal style. Upgrade your wardrobe with our mens summer beach shirt.

【Clothing Match】Men's untucked chambray shirt is all-matching and must-have clothing for the male wardrobe.You can match pants or shorts to create a casual but fashionable style,or tuck this casual business dress shirt in jeans for a classic business work style.

【Multiple Occasions】Our mens long sleeve beach button up shirt shirt is perfect for every season and suits every style. Perfect for beach, cruise, yoga, vacation, formal business, party, dating, wedding, streetwear or any casual daily wear. With its comfortable fit and timeless design, it is a must-have addition to any wardrobe.
【WARM TIPS】Low temperature hand wash or machine wash, hang to dry. The size is US size. Please refer our SIZE CHART to choose best fit for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COOFANDY Mens Casual Button Down Shirts Long Sleeve Textured Untucked Shirts Made with high-quality materials, long sleeve button up shirt offers a textured design that adds a touch of sophistication to your outfit. Whether you're going for a casual or formal look, this untucked shirt is a must-have in your wardrobe.

Men's Long Sleeve Wrinkle Free Shirt Casual Business Dress Shirt Men’s beach button up shirt with spread collar and patch pocket,it exudes a contemporary and sophisticated vibe.The long sleeves provide added warmth and coverage, making it suitable for various occasions and seasons.

Epitome of Sophistication and Elegance The well-fitted silhouette accentuates your physique, giving you a confident and polished appearance. Pair it with trousers for a fashion look or dress it down with jeans for a more relaxed vibe. Elevate your style game and experience the ultimate in comfort with this exceptional shirt.
Perfect Blend of Comfort and Soft
Mens Solid Button Up Shirts-Various Colors Available Choose from our wide range of colors to find the perfect match for your personal style.

Men's Fall Picks | Outfit Inspiration Get inspired by the latest trends and create stylish looks for the season. we have everything you need to stay fashionable and comfortable. Upgrade your wardrobe with our handpicked selection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great looking untucked shirt, feels like it was custom tailored for me. I'm extremely happy with it. I'm 6'2" 230..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material is slightly textured. Runs small.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice collared shirt. It has a slight texture to it, which I did not realize from the pictures. Please note that it does run a bit small, and it is cut to fit snuggly. I think it would have fit better if I ordered up 1 size. Also, I would not call it "wrinkle free", it definitely wrinkles. But it does iron easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortlessly Stylish and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Shirt in medium size and blue color is a wardrobe essential. This shirt features a wrinkle-free fabric, making it easy to maintain a polished look all day. Its long sleeves and untucked style offer a relaxed yet refined appearance, suitable for various occasions. This versatile shirt is ideal for men seeking both comfort and style in their everyday wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks Snazzy and is Durable; but Fits Small, and is Not very Breathable
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the black color of this shirt in L size, and I don't think I'll be wearing it much again.Packaging/Presentation: The shirt came in a clear plastic bag like a lot of other Amazon clothing does. It was folded together with some plastic pins to keep it folded, and it had an extra button included, which was a nice touch.Looks: This shirt has a distinctive "twill" pattern that my other dress shirts do not. I don't think it looks bad, honestly (besides for the sizing issues which I will get to in a moment). The "wrinkle free" claim on this shirt is also false. I agree that it wrinkles less easily than some other dress shirts that I have, but it does wrinkle, and it's not super difficult to get it to wrinkle either.Size: I am a 6 ft 240 lb man with broad shoulders, and I'll admit I often straddle between a L and XL, and I got the L here. Usually, even if I'm off a bit I can "pull it off" in a L, but I'm real close to not even doing that here. I cannot get the top button to button at all... it's not even close. So if you're bigger like me and on the fence of what you'd "normally" wear, I'd consider moving possibly even two sizes up to be safe. The sizing chart to me seems deceptively off.Feel: This shirt is not very breathable, and the best way that I can describe it is it almost feels like I'm wearing a lighter tarp. Touching it on the outside the texture feels kind of neat, but I do not like the feel of this shirt against my body which is most important to me. One positive thing I will say is this material feels very strong and durable and seems like it would last a long time, more so than any of my other dress shirts. So it has that going for it.Overall, this shirt fits way smaller than expectations (maybe even two sizes), and it is not very breathable and almost feels like I'm wearing a tarp. However, the shirt does look alright (assuming you get your sizing correct), and it is probably the strongest and most durable dress shirt that I have, so if you're looking for something sturdy I could see you wanting this. I cannot recommend this shirt though based on my expectations and experience, and even if I had the right size I still doubt I'd wear it much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Alright I guess
reviews.reviewText: It’s a well made shirt. I just don’t care for the material used to make it. It’s not stretchy at all and it wrinkles very easy. But it fits very well. I’m 5’10. 215 pounds and carry my weight in my belly and the XL fits fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, quality shirt
reviews.reviewText: There's not much to say about the shirt except that it feels like a quality shirt that definitely could do more than be casual. I typically wear this to work when tucked in, and it looks just as good as my formal button down shirts. I think it's even wanted to pair it with a formal suit, you may still be able to pull this off, but definitely with a casual suit. The sizing is perfect for me at 5'9 and about a 125 lb for getting a small. I'd definitely get similar shirts again, but just in different colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars cheaply made and too small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and color
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband who is a bit huskier and broad in the shoulders. I bought him an XXL and it fits great. Both him and I love the color and the subtle stripping in the fabric. The description says it's a twill fabric but it feels a little to thin to be twill and that's actually the only worry. Because it is so thin, I'm worried about its durability. He does have to wear and white undershirt with it. For the price it's not a bad shirt but could be a bit better.
